div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Next JS (used by companies like Netflix, Uber, Starbucks, or Twitch) with Tailwind styles.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 110px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Ruby on Rails (used by companies like Airbnb, Shopify, Github, Scribd, Slideshare, Soundcloud or Twitch) and Sidekiq for background jobs.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 256px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.p: Mainly, PostgreSQL and Redis for caching and supporting in-memory operations.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 425px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;

div.p: Debian O.S., Nginx, Passenger, Docker and Kubernetes.

div.p: AI capabilities provided by Elastic Search and ML models programmed by this specific application.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 182px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 5px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left; max-height: 130px; overflow: hidden;

div.p: At the moment, web application with mobile-first design.
Extensible to desktop and mobile apps.
